name: ArcadeShooter (CaptainRipley)
description:
Controls

shoot with left mouse click

steer with mouse

Comments

As some people had questions because of lack of UI clarity. The numbers from left to right signify (Score, Enemies Left, Health)

Ran out of time unfortunately, might come back to add stuff later, but this is what I have after a few days. lol, I hope people are able to play!

Known bugs

  • Enemy counter in the middle of screen malfunction
  • Shooting simultaneously to turning around quickly shoots two bullets in both directions

Credits

Made with Godot

3D models from Kenney

Music by Grand_Project and dopestuff from Pixabay
